resources.string:
This is a simple app to read various tags (NDEF, RFID, FeliCa, ISO 14443, etc).

You use it by holding a tag/card against the back of your device.

Please let me know if you want me to change how the data is displayed. Also send me an e-mail (adam@anyro.se) if you have any problems with the app and I'll let you know when I've fixed it. You can also see the source code and report issues at https://github.com/nadam/nfc-reader.

If you can't read any tag, please try some of the other NFC apps on Google Play and let me know if this app is the only one not working. Thanks!

/Adam
No NFC found on this device
NFC is not enabled. Please go to the wireless settings to enable it.
Press any items to see details and write into block.
RED Color blocks (Page #0 to #3) and page(#40 to #43) are manufacturer area. You can not modify this block. This blocks are for OTP, manufacturer data, and locking bits
RED Color blocks are manufacturer area. You can not modify this block. This blocks are used for locking
